text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I head to the training grounds to see<n>how Mejiro McQueen
is faring on the<n>day after her tryout race.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
This won't do. I can't seem to<n>channel strength into my
legs, just<n>like yesterday. This is worrisome...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Sigh...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Huh?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: You... I'm sorry, have we met?
choice_data_list: Not yet. I'm a new trainer. Nice to meet you.
Not yet. I'm a new trainer. Nice to meet you.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
My, a trainer? Have you come to<n>observe my routine,
perchance?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
What an honor! I must thank you for<n>coming out here for
me.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Though, I must ask: what is it about<n>me that you wish to
observe?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
As you no doubt saw, I did naught but<n>practically drag my
family's name<n>through the mud at yesterday's<n>tryout
race.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: So after seeing that, why me?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Tenacity... I see. Thank you for<n>looking beyond the surface
level.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
As an Umamusume of the Mejiro<n>family, it wouldn't suit me
to be weak<n>of will.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
At the very least, I am glad I was able<n>to show that I remain
unshakable in<n>my efforts to succeed.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Though, I do hope that you will refrain<n>from deciding
whether or not to bring<n>me under your tutelage until after
you<n>have seen me run more.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Another thing that I possess as a<n>Mejiro is a certain lofty
ambition—one<n>that I cannot afford to leave unfulfilled<n>under
any circumstances.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Yes. Namely, victory at the Tenno Sho.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
That is, of course, something I cannot<n>hope to accomplish
without the proper<n>guidance from a trainer.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
If that trainer were not able to place<n>their full confidence in
my ability, then<n>there is no conceivable way that I<n>would
receive said guidance.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
So again, please wait to decide<n>whether or not to scout me
until you<n>have properly assessed my<n>capabilities.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I need to be assured that my trainer<n>will uphold me to the
standards<n>expected of a Mejiro.
choice_data_list:
You take a lot of pride in the Mejiro name,
don't you?

You take a lot of pride in the Mejiro name,
don't you?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Of course! It is such a privilege to<n>have been born to my
house.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I am surrounded by a caring<n>family—people who have
supported<n>me my whole life. I could not abide<n>letting any
of them down.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
It is thanks to them that I even stand<n>on this training track
now.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Which is why I, as a Mejiro<n>Umamusume, want nothing
more than<n>to achieve the glory befitting of my<n>family
name.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
To that end, I must insist that you only<n>make your decision
after you witness<n>my physical ability as well.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Thank you. I know very well that myshowing yesterday was incrediblypoor... But I will redeem myselfhere!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Here I go. Observe the fruits of years<n>of training within the
Mejiro estate!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro McQueen takes off running,<n>her spirits appearing
somewhat<n>renewed.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Phew...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Likely owing to the fact that she has<n>been training from a
young age, her<n>form is refined and beautiful.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: All right... Once more!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She possesses the energy and the<n>tenacity fit for long
distances.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
There is no doubt in my mind that she<n>can become a
first-class stayer, easily<n>capable of taking home a win at the<n>
spring Tenno Sho.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: There is one thing I am concerned<n>about, though.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... What did you think?
choice_data_list:
Do you find it difficult to channel strength into
your legs?

Do you find it difficult to channel strength into
your legs?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Huh? W-well, um...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Urgh...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Oh, n-no! That's not the case at all!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Um, please excuse me! I'm going to<n>run one more lap!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I can't embarass myself again!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Mejiro McQueen continues to train as<n>if nothing is amiss. I
can clearly see<n>that isn't the case, however.
